algorithm_technique: Graph construction and root identification using a dictionary and set.
problem_summary_simple: Construct a binary tree from a list of parent-child relationships.
problem_summary_technical: Use a dictionary to map values to TreeNode objects and a set to track child nodes to identify the root.
key_insights: The problem can be viewed as building a graph where nodes are tree values and edges are parent-child relationships.
A dictionary is essential for efficient lookup and creation of TreeNode objects.
The root node is the one that appears as a parent but never as a child.
